lyrics:
"James Worthy" lyrics Gucci Mane Lyrics "James Worthy" [Hook:] 9-45 and I can't lend you my Jordans nigga Number's 45, if you Jordan the size Still got the 45, 45 the grills on mine And nigga bout want a 9 (James Worthy) George Kirkland, I think I'm on the deep and blow some purp yea I'm jumpin out the GM though early I'm pulled up serving drink like Bobby Hurly Count 42 bricks yea James Worthy [Verse:] Don't send no 2's with the 4'she had em Kobe's on the Jeep and LeBron's on the low Bout the Jordan's on the coup, 21's on the front They be dope, do the plastic man, hey set off me dog Pussy only drink with pour up like I'm shakin away the gold Shit spooked the brick game, I'm tryna make it back home It's a sticky situation when you cutting through 10 deuces on the floor, on the track let go Own career to the damn boys I need some hoes in this house but I ain't talkin bout ho rich They be talkin bout dough when you swing my dance move And I keep money on the floor cause you bring with mo flow I'm a pock me some sparky shit, nigga I can smoke Hit the Bentley, hit the part of me, she can pull a ho Call me round the hood, they know I rob the hood young with the pole Send the white bitches, black bitch, 100 duzins chromes [Hook:] 9-45 and I can't lend you my Jordans nigga Number's 45, if you Jordan the size Still got the 45, 45 the grills on mine And nigga bout want a 9 (James Worthy) George Kirkland, I think I'm on the deep and blow some purp yea I'm jumpin out the GM though early I'm pulled up serving drink like Bobby Hurly Count 42 bricks yea James Worthy if ( /Android|webOS|iPhone|iPod|iPad|BlackBerry|IEMobile|Opera Mini/i.test(navigator.userAgent) ) { document.getElementById('azmxmbanner').style.display='block'; document.write('

'); } Submit Corrections AZLyrics G Gucci Mane Lyrics mixtape: "Trap Back 2" (2013) Dont Deserve It Family Tree Playin With The Money Thirtsy Crush Hood Bitches Like I Used 2 Cant Walk Dumb Fine That Pack Crazy Things Iron On Me Done With Her Full Of It Picture That James Worthy White Man Search
title: James Worthy Lyrics | AZLyrics.com
